props.text: Using our native Perspective App, enables the use of many built in pieces of hardware within your mobile device, such as the camera, the accelerometer, or the NFC Scanner. Data from these tools can be pulled into the Perspective Session and used in various ways. View this page on your mobile device using our Perspective App to try out these components.

onChange.script:
if previousValue and previousValue.value:
		self.custom.previousAccel = previousValue.value

messageHandlers.script:
def listToString(list):
		'''
		Turns a list into a string spacing out each element in the list and
		returns the associated string.
		'''
		string = ''
		for element in list:
			string += str(element) + ' '
		return string
		
	# Record each record as a dictionary and place inside an array
	array = []
	for row in payload:
		data = {
				'type':row['type'],
				'typeNameFormat':row['typeNameFormat'],
				'payload':row['payload'],
				'string':row['string'],
				'bytes':listToString(row['bytes'])
				}
		array.append(data)
	
	# Open Popup NFC to display records 	
	system.perspective.openPopup('Popup_NFC', 'Features/Real-time Status/Mobile/Overview/Popup NFC', params={'data':array}, title='NFC Values')
